Description: DESCRIPTION:THIS AGREEMENT PROVIDES FUNDING TO THE UNIVERSITY OF NEW ORLEANS RESEARCH AND TECHNOLOGY FOUNDATION (UNORTF) TO SUPPORT THE LAKE PONTCHARTRAIN BASIN RESTORATION PROGRAM WHICH MAINTAINS, PROTECTS AND RESTORES THE WATER QUALITY OF THE LAKE PONTCHARTRAIN BASIN. UNORTF WILL OVERSEE SUBAWARD GRANTEE PROJECTS TO MONITOR THE LAKE'S WATER QUALITY AND DETERMINE THE HEALTH OF THE WATERSHED, DEVELOP GREEN INFRASTRUCTURE MUNICIPAL EDUCATION, EDUCATE BASIN RESIDENTS ON WATER PROTECTION AND POLLUTION PREVENTION, CONDUCT SEWER SYSTEM EVALUATIONS AND SURVEYS, AND DEVELOP DESIGNS AND STUDIES TO DETERMINE INFRASTRUCTURE UPGRADES TO PREVENT OR REDUCE POLLUTION. ANTICIPATED OUTCOMES AND DELIVERABLES INCLUDE IMPROVED ASSESSMENT OF THE WATER QUALITY OF THE BASIN, INCREASED AWARENESS OF WATER QUALITY IN THE WATERSHED AND IMPROVED SEWER SYSTEM PERFORMANCE. THE BENEFICIARIES OF THE PROGRAM ARE THE RESIDENTS OF THE STATE OF LOUISIANA.ACTIVITIES:UNORTF WILL OVERSEE SUBAWARD GRANTEE PROJECTS TO MONITOR THE LAKE'S WATER QUALITY AND DETERMINE THE HEALTH OF THE WATERSHED, DEVELOP GREEN INFRASTRUCTURE MUNICIPAL EDUCATION, EDUCATE BASIN RESIDENTS ON WATER PROTECTION AND POLLUTION PREVENTION, CONDUCT SEWER SYSTEM EVALUATIONS AND SURVEYS, AND DEVELOP DESIGNS AND STUDIES TO DETERMINE INFRASTRUCTURE UPGRADES TO PREVENT OR REDUCE POLLUTION.SUBRECIPIENT:SUBAWARD PROJECTS ACTIVITIES INCLUDE MONITORING THE LAKE'S WATER QUALITY AND DETERMINE THE HEALTH OF THE WATERSHED, DEVELOPING GREEN INFRASTRUCTURE MUNICIPAL EDUCATION, EDUCATING BASIN RESIDENTS ON WATER PROTECTION AND POLLUTION PREVENTION, CONDUCTING SEWER SYSTEM EVALUATIONS AND SURVEYS, AND DEVELOPING DESIGNS AND STUDIES TO DETERMINE INFRASTRUCTURE UPGRADES TO PREVENT OR REDUCE POLLUTION. OUTCOMES: ANTICIPATED OUTCOMES AND DELIVERABLES INCLUDE IMPROVED ASSESSMENT OF THE WATER QUALITY OF THE BASIN, INCREASED AWARENESS OF WATER QUALITY IN THE WATERSHED AND IMPROVED SEWER SYSTEM PERFORMANCE. THE BENEFICIARIES OF THE PROGRAM ARE THE RESIDENTS OF THE STATE OF LOUISIANA.

THIS AGREEMENT PROVIDES FUNDING TO THE UNIVERSITY OF NEW ORLEANS RESEARCH AND TECHNOLOGY FOUNDATION (UNORTF) TO SUPPORT THE LAKE PONTCHARTRAIN BASIN RESTORATION PROGRAM WHICH MAINTAINS, PROTECTS AND RESTORES THE WATER QUALITY OF THE LAKE PONTCHARTRAIN BASIN. UNORTF WILL OVERSEE PROJECTS TO MONITOR THE LAKE'S WATER QUALITY AND DETERMINE THE HEALTH OF THE WATERSHED, DEVELOP GREEN INFRASTRUCTURE MUNICIPAL EDUCATION, EDUCATE BASIN RESIDENTS ON WATER PROTECTION AND POLLUTION PREVENTION, CONDUCT SEWER SYSTEM EVALUATIONS AND SURVEYS, AND DEVELOP DESIGNS AND STUDIES TO DETERMINE INFRASTRUCTURE UPGRADES TO PREVENT OR REDUCE POLLUTION.

THIS AGREEMENT PROVIDES FUNDING TO THE UNIVERSITY OF NEW ORLEANS RESEARCH AND TECHNOLOGY FOUNDATION (UNORTF) TO SUPPORT THE LAKE PONTCHARTRAIN BASIN RESTORATION PROGRAM WHICH MAINTAINS, PROTECTS AND RESTORES THE WATER QUALITY OF THE LAKE PONTCHARTRAIN BASIN. UNORTF WILL OVERSEE PROJECTS TO MONITOR THE LAKE'S WATER QUALITY AND DETERMINE THE HEALTH OF THE WATERSHED, DEVELOP GREEN INFRASTRUCTURE MUNICIPAL EDUCATION, EDUCATE BASIN RESIDENTS ON WATER PROTECTION AND POLLUTION PREVENTION, CONDUCT SEWER SYSTEM EVALUATIONS AND SURVEYS, AND DEVELOP DESIGNS AND STUDIES TO DETERMINE INFRASTRUCTURE UPGRADES TO PREVENT OR REDUCE POLLUTION.

THIS AGREEMENT PROVIDES SUPPORT THE LAKE PONTCHARTRAIN BASIN RESTORATION PROGRAM WHICH MAINTAINS, PROTECTS AND RESTORES THE WATER QUALITY OF THE LAKE PONTCHARTRAIN BASIN. THE RECIPIENT WILL OVERSEE PROJECTS TO MONITOR THE LAKE'S WATER QUALITY AND DETERMINE THE HEALTH OF THE WATERSHED, DEVELOP GREEN INFRASTRUCTURE MUNICIPAL EDUCATION, EDUCATE BASIN RESIDENTS ON WATER PROTECTION AND POLLUTION PREVENTION, CONDUCT SEWER SYSTEM EVALUATIONS AND SURVEYS, AND DEVELOP DESIGNS AND STUDIES TO DETERMINE INFRASTRUCTURE UPGRADES TO PREVENT OR REDUCE POLLUTION.
THESE PROJECTS WILL FOCUS ON THE REDUCTION OR ELIMINATION OF SEWERAGE RELATED POLLUTION AND PROVIDE EDUCATION AND OUTREACH TO IMPROVE WATER QUALITY I
